verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5315><s%> 'If anyone <S%H2398>sins<s%> <S%H7684>unintentionally,<s%> in any of the things which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H4687>commanded<s%> not to be <S%H6213>done,<s%> and <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> one of <S%H2007>them:<s%>

if the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%> so as to bring <S%H819>guilt<s%> on the <S%H5971>people,<s%> then let him <S%H7126>offer<s%> for his <S%H2403>sin,<s%> which he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> a <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

He shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> it to the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H676>finger<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which is in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting;<s%> and he shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out all of rest of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> which is at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

He shall take all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> <S%H7311>off<s%> of <S%H2459>it;<s%> the fat that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>innards,<s%> and all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on the <S%H7130>innards,<s%>

and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on <S%H3689>them,<s%> which is by the loins, and the <S%H3508>cover<s%> on the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> with the <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> he shall take <S%H5493>away,<s%>

as it is taken <S%H7311>off<s%> of the <S%H7794>bull<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>
The <S%H6499>bull<s%>'s <S%H5785>skin,<s%> all its <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> with its <S%H7218>head,<s%> and with its <S%H3767>legs,<s%> its <S%H7130>innards,<s%> and its <S%H6569>dung,<s%>

even the whole <S%H6499>bull<s%> shall he carry <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> where the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> are poured <S%H8211>out,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> it on <S%H6086>wood<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%> <S%H413>Where<s%> the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> are poured <S%H8211>out<s%> it shall be <S%H8313>burned.<s%>

<S%H5712><s%>"'If the whole congregation of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7686>sins,<s%> and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> is <S%H5956>hidden<s%> from the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> and they have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of the things which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H4687>commanded<s%> not to be <S%H6213>done,<s%> and are <S%H816>guilty;<s%>

when the <S%H2403>sin<s%> in which they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> is <S%H3045>known,<s%> then the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H935>offering,<s%> and bring it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

The <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and the <S%H6499>bull<s%> shall be <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
The <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> to the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting:<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H676>finger<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>veil.<s%>

He shall <S%H5414>put<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that is in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting;<s%> and the rest of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> he shall pour <S%H8210>out<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> which is at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>
All its <S%H2459>fat<s%> he shall <S%H7311>take<s%> from <S%H6999>it,<s%> and burn it on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Thus shall he <S%H6213>do<s%> with the <S%H6499>bull;<s%> as he <S%H6213>did<s%> with the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> so shall he <S%H6213>do<s%> with <S%H3548>this;<s%> and the priest shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5545>them,<s%> and they shall be forgiven.

He shall carry <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> it as he <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H6499>bull.<s%> It is the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> for the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>

<S%H5387><s%>"'When a ruler <S%H2398>sins,<s%> and <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> one of all the things which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H4687>commanded<s%> not to be <S%H6213>done,<s%> and is <S%H816>guilty;<s%>

if his <S%H2403>sin,<s%> in which he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> is made <S%H3045>known<s%> to <S%H935>him,<s%> he shall bring as his <S%H7133>offering<s%> <S%H8163>a<s%> <S%H8163>goat,<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish.<s%>

He shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8163>goat,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where they <S%H7819>kill<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> It is a sin <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> with his <S%H676>finger,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%> He shall pour <S%H8210>out<s%> the rest of its <S%H1818>blood<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

All its <S%H2459>fat<s%> he shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> like the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him concerning his <S%H2403>sin,<s%> and he will be <S%H5545>forgiven.<s%>

<S%H259><s%>"'If <S%H259>anyone<s%> of the <S%H776>common<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly,<s%> in <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of the things which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H4687>commanded<s%> not to be <S%H6213>done,<s%> and is <S%H816>guilty;<s%>

if his <S%H2403>sin,<s%> which he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> is made <S%H3045>known<s%> to <S%H935>him,<s%> then he shall bring for his <S%H7133>offering<s%> <S%H8166>a<s%> <S%H8166>goat,<s%> a <S%H5347>female<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> for his <S%H2403>sin<s%> which he has <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>

He shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of burnt <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of its <S%H1818>blood<s%> with his <S%H676>finger,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering;<s%> and the rest of its <S%H1818>blood<s%> he shall pour <S%H8210>out<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

All its <S%H2459>fat<s%> he shall take <S%H5493>away,<s%> like the <S%H2459>fat<s%> is taken <S%H5493>away<s%> from off of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5545>him,<s%> and he will be forgiven.
<S%H935><s%>"'If he brings a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> as his offering for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H7133>offering,<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H5347>female<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish.<s%>

He shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where they <S%H7819>kill<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> with his <S%H676>finger,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering;<s%> and all the rest of its <S%H1818>blood<s%> he shall pour <S%H8210>out<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

All its <S%H2459>fat<s%> he shall take <S%H5493>away,<s%> like the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H3775>lamb<s%> is taken <S%H5493>away<s%> from the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> on the offerings of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> made by <S%H801>fire;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him concerning his <S%H2403>sin<s%> that he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and he will be <S%H5545>forgiven.<s%>
